page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT - There are 3 quarries in the area the largest having a workforce of 200 and the smallest with 6. The main employee inside the village is the local garage which does steel fabrication with a workforce of 12. There are 30 self-employed persons, mainly lorry drivers,24 farmers and farm workers, 20 quarry workers, 6 teachers, 2 lawyers, 1 solicitor, 2 shopkeepers, 1 postofficer, 10 builders, 2 architects, 1 milkman, 1 coalmerchant 2 publicans, 1 design consultant, 2 publicans, 1 industrial designer, 1 oil rig engineer,1 Peak Park warden. There are 28 working wives full and part-time in offices and hospitals in the area.
